content: The Spirit of Captain Kalpa-Wave can be found at Longevity Road in Valley of Ecstasy in The New West. From the Shrine, head forwards towards the frozen enemies and up towards the large temple. Upon reaching the temple, you can find Captain Kalpa-Wave, whom you can defeat to get the item.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Spirit_of_Captain_Kalpa-Wave.md', within the main section titled 'The Spirit of Captain Kalpa-Wave'.
The content is as follows:
The Spirit of Captain Kalpa-Wave can be found at Longevity Road in Valley of Ecstasy in The New West. From the Shrine, head forwards towards the frozen enemies and up towards the large temple. Upon reaching the temple, you can find Captain Kalpa-Wave, whom you can defeat to get the item.
